word:
The next day the meeting began where it had ended the night before. Those who had been blessed at the 
                                                                           161
previous meeting retained the blessing. They had not slept much, for the Spirit of God rested upon them through the night. Some confessed their feeling of disunion with us and their backslidden condition. The meeting continued, without intermission, from ten o'clock in the forenoon till five in the evening.
